tool_description: Calculates compatibility scores between project descriptions and grant opportunities using multiple matching criteria and weighted algorithms.

project_description.description: Detailed description of the project goals, methods, and expected outcomes

project_budget.description: Total project budget amount in USD

target_populations.description: Target populations or beneficiaries of the project

methodology_approaches.description: Research or implementation methodologies to be used

grant_ids.description: Array of grant opportunity identifiers to score against

scoring_weights.description: Custom weights for different matching criteria (topic, budget, duration, population, methodology)

error_messages: Invalid project budget: project_budget must be a positive integer.
Invalid project duration: project_duration must be between 1 and 120 months.
Invalid grant IDs: One or more grant IDs could not be found.
Invalid scoring weights: If provided, must be 5 numbers between 0 and 1 that sum to 1.0.
Insufficient project data: project_title and project_description cannot be empty.
Scoring calculation failed: Unable to compute compatibility scores for provided data.
usage: Provide project_title, project_description, project_budget, project_duration, and grant_ids array. Optionally include target_populations, methodology_approaches, and custom scoring_weights. The tool returns ranked compatibility scores.

total_grants_scored.description: Number of grants successfully scored against the project

grant_ids_ranked.description: Grant IDs sorted by compatibility score (highest first)

compatibility_scores.description: Compatibility scores (0-100) corresponding to ranked grant IDs

match_categories.description: Primary matching categories for each grant (topic, budget, methodology, etc.)

strengths.description: Key alignment strengths for top-scoring grants

gaps.description: Identified gaps or misalignments for top-scoring grants

recommendations.description: Strategic recommendations for pursuing top matches
